__e: I did write to you about Warren and me, didn't I?

You know, I know that we got off to a rocky start today... but I spoke to Warren and he's willing to be flexible about the checkout time. So, we can have seven full hours of daylight tomorrow to have fun.
You see, tomorrow night, I've gotta have dinner with Warren and one of these personnel directors.
Dr. Warren, I want you to get on the phone. Consult the top medical specialists, wherever they are. - Yes, sir.
Frankly, Mr. Warner, I'm beginning to wonder if my attorney is for me.
Warren you can get into the car and then we can go.
You know, Warren, you've lost contact with living people.
Hey, Warren, why don't you look around you? Don't you feel a little, uh, left out?
Maybe Doc Warren has the answer.
The 6 of us, with almost no budget and in secret will solve a case the Warren Commission couldn't?
Warren bought the flower shop, didn't he? - Yes.
Warren's my brother and I don't want to be there.
Mrs. Warren's son looks real fine, don't he?
